Package org.apache.accumulo.minicluster

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    MiniAccumuloCluster
    A utility class that will create Zookeeper and Accumulo processes that write all of their data to a single local directory.
    MiniAccumuloConfig
    Holds configuration for MiniAccumuloCluster.
    MiniAccumuloInstance Deprecated.
    since 2.0.0, Use MiniAccumuloCluster.getClientProperties(File) instead
    MiniAccumuloRunner
    A runner for starting up a MiniAccumuloCluster from the command line using an optional configuration properties file.
    MiniAccumuloRunner.Opts  
    MiniAccumuloRunner.PropertiesConverter  
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    MemoryUnit  
    ServerType
